title: An Elephant Named Joseph

Instructions: Use the buttons in the top right to switch the input.
Algorithm: Each frame one player gives their presents to another one. For bigger player count, run 1000 such steps per frame.
Second part of the puzzle is slow because of the manipulation of such a huge array. Would have to consider another solution like a linked list.

note: The 'nice' display couldn't scale up for the actual puzzle. Using a linked list rather than an array could probably help a lot.
